loginView.authTwitterTip: Some functions of the TagAI require corresponding permissions for Twitter, and you can choose the functions that need to be authorized according to your needs
loginView.p1: uses progressive web app technology that combines the best features of traditional websites and platform-specific apps
loginView.addressUsed: This address has been used by other twitter, please change another one in your wallet.
loginView.registerRequire: We will help you create a web3 social account and delegate posting key permissions to our account. Due to the cost of registering a web3 social account, we will cost your fee for registration.
loginView.noBitip: Not yet have one? Click here to
loginView.bindAddressTip: Bind this address to your twitter account. And you can't change it later.
loginView.fidUsedTip: This Farcaster account has already been used.
loginView.createWalletTip: Now you need to create a wallet for donut use
loginView.authPostTip: Post permission: Create tweets/spaces on platform
loginView.needPostAuth: You need to authorize the post permission to create tweets/spaces
loginView.needLikeAuth: You need to authorize the like permission to curate tweets/spaces

web3.addressMismatch: The connected address is mismatch, please change to {address} in your wallet.

profileView.captureDesc: A portion of the trade fees generated by users trading tokens will be injected into the IPShare of the connector

createCommunity.initAmountTip: Input how many TagCoin you wanna buy first.
createCommunity.tickUsed: This name has been registed, please change to another one
createCommunity.buyTip: Choose how many 【TagCoin】 you want to buy (optional)
createCommunity.deployTip: You can ask TipTagAI deploy token for you right now:
createCommunity.deployTip1: Write a tweet with any thoughts about the token you want to make. TipTagAI will analyze your tweet and help you create the token with ticker/description/logo.
createCommunity.deployTip2: Reply or quote a tweet which you find something interesting.
createCommunity.deployTip3: All of that only need you copy the following command to you tweet content.

buyAndSell.tweetTip: You must create social account to tweet.
buyAndSell.blinkTip: You can make blink to Twitter if you have created IPShare, user trade tag from your blink can bring you reward.
buyAndSell.invalidTokenSellTip: This token is created by the old version which has an abnormality and has been closed for buying. Please sell as soon as possible.

community.distributionTip: The total amount of tokens is distributed through three parts, including 15% for social distribution, 65% for bonding curve sales, and 20% for entering the liquidity pool
community.spaceHasCreated: This space has been created curation.
community.spaceInvalidLink: It's not a valid space link
community.spaceNotYours: This space is not created by yourself
community.spaceHasEnded: This space has been ended or cancelled

curation.tweetWithTickTip: Write something about {tick}, you can earn {tick} if someone like your tweet.
curation.vpDesc: Like/Retweet a tweet will cost you vp(voting power). And you can earn tagcoin after 3 days. Each account has 200 VP value. VP value will recover linearly, 200 VP every 3 days.
curation.opDesc: All tweet operation(like/retweet/quote/reply will cost you op(operation power) because of all the operation will sync to the blockchain. Each account has 2000 OP value. OP value will recover linearly, 2000 OP every 3 days.
curation.curationTip: Curate a tweet or a space can gain curate rewards. Write a tweet or join a space as host/co-host/speaker can gain creator rewards. When the rewards are settled, you can claim all this tagcoin rewards.

postView.tweetOnChainTip1: Write a tweet as curation and receive curates from other users.
postView.tweetOnChainTip2: Or you can write a tweet directly in the following text box and click go tweet.
postView.author: Author
postView.speaker: Speaker
postView.writeCommentTip: Write comment to the tweet here

ipshare.desc: Create IPShare, become a personal IP, receive support, and earn IPShare transaction fees.

errMessage.notCommunityOwner: You are not the community manager
errMessage.userOrderPending: You have a pending order now
errMessage.noRewardToClaim: No reward to claim or the reward has been claimed
errMessage.likeFrequent: Like so frequently, please operate 15 minutes later
errMessage.retweetFrequent: Retweet so frequently, please operate 15 minutes later
